message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to offer it to you at a price of $12000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and quality.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better price, but I have to consider the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's worth to me.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Would you be willing to accept that price?
